propSpec.name: pins
propSpec.desc: An array of pins that should be rendered. Each object needs { [keyLat], [keyLon] } based on what the properties have been set to

propSpec.name: keyLat
propSpec.desc: The key (in each pin object) that defines the latitude

propSpec.name: keyLon
propSpec.desc: The key (in each pin object) that defines the longitude

propSpec.name: keyPinIcon
propSpec.desc: The key (in each pin object) that defines an override for the pin icon

propSpec.name: keyPinSize
propSpec.desc: The key (in each pin object) that defines an override for the pin's font size

propSpec.name: keyPinColor
propSpec.desc: The key (in each pin object) that defines an override for the pin color

propSpec.name: centerLat
propSpec.desc: Defines the latitude of the point around which the view should be centered

propSpec.name: centerLon
propSpec.desc: Defines the longitude of the point around which the view should be centered

propSpec.name: zoom
propSpec.desc: Defines the zoom level of the view

propSpec.name: hasControls
propSpec.desc: When set to false, the map controls will not be displayed

propSpec.name: routeFrom
propSpec.desc: Sets the coordinate of the location from which the route should be calculated

propSpec.name: routeTo
propSpec.desc: Sets the coordinate of the location to which the route should be calculated

propSpec.name: pinIcon
propSpec.desc: Defines the name of the icon that should be rendered on pin locations

propSpec.name: pinColor
propSpec.desc: Defines the colour of the pins on the map

propSpec.name: pinSize
propSpec.desc: The font size of the pin icons on the map

propSpec.name: routeColorRgbArray
propSpec.desc: An RGB array used to render the path (if a route is defined)

propSpec.name: routeWidth
propSpec.desc: Defines the width (in px) of the rendered path (if a route is defined)
